name: HG Adventure
description:
You suddenly enter a whole new world empty-handed. Start a whole new adventure all your own. Farming, fishing, building, cooking, alchemy and living a quiet life. Or is it fighting monsters, leveling up, learning skills, building equipment and discovering the hidden secrets of the world? Or maybe I want them all.
Find magic stones, money, and other useful things, craft tools, craft weapons, and gather the resources you need to create everything.
Build a house, a fort, even a castle. Invite people to move in and they'll offer portable features or sell items to help you complete your journey! Or even go on a journey with you!
In this game, you can build your own hut to defend against external threats!


Of course, you can also build empty huts to invite NPCS to move in and they will provide you with all kinds of help!
Want to get rich first farm! You can grow a variety of fruits and vegetables and use them for cooking or alchemy or give them to NPCS! But don't forget to water it every day


Or enjoy leisurely but unknown fishing


Dig into all kinds of resources to create the weapons, armor, tools, building accessories you want!


Kill monsters raise your level and learn the skills you want!


Challenge the boss for more power!


Use the alchemy table to explore unknown recipes and develop completely unknown potions!


Help NPCS increase their goodwill towards you and they will provide you with all kinds of help!
